title: [Newest] Quarterly Survey of Building Materials - Concrete Roofing Tiles

description.text: If the company details or structure have changed contact us on {telephone_number_link} or email {email_link}

contents.description: This questionnaire has been designed for online mode. You may notice changes compared with the paper version, such as to the ordering of questions and sections.
There is additional guidance throughout the questionnaire. However, if you require support then please contact us on 0300 1234 931 or via email at surveys@ons.gov.uk

list: This voluntary survey is conducted by the Office for National Statistics on behalf of the Department for Business and Trade (DBT).
Data should relate to all sites in England, Scotland, Wales and Northern Ireland unless otherwise stated.
You can provide informed estimates if actual figures are not available.
We will treat your data securely and confidentially.
You can save a copy of your answers at the end of this questionnaire using the ‘Download as PDF’ button.

description.text: This survey collects information of your business's production of concrete roofing tiles as a building material during the quarter {ref_p_start_date} to {ref_p_end_date}.

contents.description: View more information about this survey (this link opens in a new tab)
This survey has the following sections:
You will be presented with a section for each local unit you have previously provided details for. Check this list for any errors.
This includes:

list: confirming units that are still in production
deleting any units that are no longer appropriate, with the date that they ceased production

contents.description: In this section you will be asked to provide details of any new local units that have come into production since your last return, with a separate section being generated for each additional unit.
This includes:

list: name, address, and postcode of unit
nature of work carried out at the site
number of persons employed
date the unit came into production

contents.description: You will be asked to provide the following information for concrete roofing tiles:

list: tiles manufactured
tiles delivered
closing stock
new works brought into use since date of last return

contents.description: In this section you will be asked to provide comments relating to your return and any new works.

list: DBT uses the information for monitoring trends in the construction industries.

For the benefit of industry, and the public generally, building materials information is published by DBT in their 'Monthly Statistics of Building Materials and Components' (this link opens in a new tab)

contents.description: You will be presented with a section for each local unit you have previously provided details for. Check this list for any errors.
This includes:

list: confirming units that are still in production
deleting any units that are no longer appropriate, with the date that they ceased production

contents.description: In this section you will be asked to provide the name, address, and postcode of any new local units that have come into production since your last return. A separate section will then generate for each additional unit.

This includes:

list: nature of work carried out at the site
number of persons employed
date the unit came into production

contents.description: This section includes:

list: tiles manufactured
tiles delivered
closing stock
new works brought into use since date of last return

title.text: For the period {ref_p_start_date} to {ref_p_end_date}, has {ru_name} produced, delivered, or held stock of concrete roofing tiles?
For the period {ref_p_start_date} to {ref_p_end_date}, what was the square metres of roof area covered by roofing tiles manufactured by {ru_name}?

contents.description: This refers to products completed and ready for dispatch.

answers.label: Roofing tiles manufactured
answers.description: Enter square metres of roof area covered to three decimal places. For example, 1 square yard = 0.836 square metres.

question.title: For the reporting period, what was the square metres of roof area covered by roofing tiles delivered by your business?

contents.description: This refers to products which have actually left the premises.

answers.label: Roofing tiles delivered
answers.description: Enter square metres of roof area covered to three decimal places. For example, 1 square yard = 0.836 square metres.

question.title: For the reporting period, what was your business's total closing stock of roofing tiles?

answers.label: Total closing stock of roofing tiles
answers.description: Enter square metres of roof area covered to three decimal places. For example, 1 square yard = 0.836 square metres.

question.title: Provide details of any new works brought into use since the date of the last return

answers.label: New works brought into use since the date of the last return

question.title: Please provide any further details that will help us understand your figures and to tell an industry story
description: If you provide comments, we are less likely to contact you with data queries.

list: comments on figures included in this your return
explain  any substantial fluctuations in your figures compared with those of the previous return

contents.description: Your response will help inform decision-makers how best to support the UK population and economy at this challenging time.
Learn more about how we use this data

submission.title: Check your answers and submit
submission.warning: You must submit this survey to complete it
submission.guidance: You will have the opportunity to view, save or print a copy of your answers after submitting this survey.
